analysisParams.promptTemplate: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.

promptUsed.system: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.
promptUsed.user:
Please analyze these tweets from @sun and provide a summary of what they mainly talked about in the past week:

Excited to share somethings we working on and catch up with friends on the chat! 

This is gonna be fun

some ppl say i do,
popup city / hacker residency / hackathons

and now they confused why am i doing blockchain event at the largest tech event in humanity, @expo2025japan 

and doing a documentary about @ethereum 

tbh, my vision never changed,
bring real world adoption to blockchain.
escape the echo chamber and be the retard that tries things no one has ever tried.

@emilyxlai working on a blockchain showcase for World Expo, would love some marketing help! 

https://t.co/Urjujr48dt

@Starknet Massive is a small word for this. ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥

@0xstark @ethereum @ethereumfndn celebrate in the World Expo @expo2025japan

summary: The tweets from @sun in the past week mainly revolve around their involvement in blockchain-related events and projects. They express excitement about working on initiatives like a blockchain showcase for the World Expo and a documentary about Ethereum. @sun emphasizes their vision of bringing real-world adoption to blockchain technology and trying innovative approaches. There is a mention of confusion from some individuals about their participation in a blockchain event at a tech expo. Additionally, there is a request for marketing help for the blockchain showcase. Overall, the sentiment is enthusiastic and focused on pushing boundaries in the blockchain space.
